Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. The value this product offers is unparalleled, and we're confident it will meet all your expectations. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we're extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell the product to you at $14995, a special discount considering your high level of interest and the value it brings to your business. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this fantastic deal. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,995. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,995
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
